com.novicehacks.autobot.config.parser

Class ConfigParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novicehacks.autobot.config.parser.ConfigParser

  • public class ConfigParser
extends Object
    ConfigParser is a singleton implementation. It is really of no use to create multiple instances for loading the same configuration file, hence singleton implementation. It will load the configuration object with the "autobot.properties".
    Author:
    Sharath Chand Bhaskara for NoviceHacks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ConfigFile
      All the below constants define the property names in autobot.properties, and are used to populate the state of SysConfig

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String commandResource()
      The absoulute path of the file where Command information is defined.

      The absoulute path of the file where Executable information is defined.
      static ConfigParser getIntance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the config parser object.
      String monitorResource()
      The absoulute path of the file where Monitors information is defined.
      String serverResource()
      The absoulute path of the file where server information is defined.
      SysConfig systemConfig()
      Creates the SysConfig object from the properties loaded.
